principWork.title: Principle of operation
principWork.description__one: The air in motion collects dust, fine particles, etc. into the Rainbow water tank.
principWork.description__two: Water in motion collects dust and debris in the water with the help of the resulting water vortex. And clean, refreshed air is distributed throughout the room.
principWork.description__three: The combination of Aerodynamics and Hydrodynamics gives you a clean and healthy lifestyle.

callBlock.title: Request a call
callBlock.callThanks: Our operators will contact you to confirm registration and answer your questions. Regards, Rainbow

services.title: Our services
services.servicesDescription__one: We believe that in our difficult time you have things to do that are more important and interesting than cleaning your apartment, or in order to put things in order at home, you spend a lot of time and effort.
services.servicesDescription__two: So, your long-awaited repair has come to an end. The builders call you and inform you that their work is finished and the “owner(s)” should come and take the job.
services.servicesTitle__three: General cleaning from A to Z
services.servicesDescription__three: General cleaning is always accompanied by long, primarily emotional preparations on the part of the owners.
services.servicesDescription__four: Any hostess or owner will confirm that even the current cleaning of the house is a rather laborious and tedious process, especially after a hard day's work.
services.servicesDescription__five: So, warm days are coming and the hostesses are beginning to endure their carpets and carpets for washing and getting rid of dust. This process is very difficult
